title: Biodiversity loss and financial stability as a new frontier for central banks: An exploration for France
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 223

Author(s): Paul Hadji-Lazaro, Mathilde Salin, Romain Svartzman, Etienne Espagne, Julien Gauthey, Joshua Berger, Julien Calas, Antoine Godin, Antoine Vallier
